game.name: Mini Car Racer
game.description:
Getting indulged into contrary smaller car racing game is indeed a different gaming joy that you get from participating into free online mini car racing game online. In the mini car racer free game online you just not get an opportunity to participate into multi level car racing game but also offered with freedom and liberty to design the car according to the experience possessed by you in playing free car racing game online.

For the mini car racing game for the car design there you can choose between from the expert cars or a commonly designed car. For the design of the car there are four different variables that have been here used for the car?s outlook for participating in the mini car game.

The car can be changed with respect to the wheels, tracks, legs and design to be mentioned there. After making the adequate changes into the design you are ready to participate in the actual best car racing game.

The deadline of time is an important aspect in this online game as you have to complete this race in the appropriate time and period. While on the path there different hindrances are to be cross and passed out. For the purpose of control arrow keys are used in the car and for nitro X key is pressed to speed up the car?s speed.
